glsa.title: vsftpd: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A Denial of Service vulnerability was found in vsftpd.

background.p: vsftpd is a very secure FTP daemon written with speed, size and security in mind.

description.p: A Denial of Service vulnerability was discovered in vsftpd. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote authenticated attacker could cause a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All vsftpd users should upgrade to the latest version:
